thread.title: Gautier man suspected of stealing guns from 3 homes
thread.title_full: Gautier man suspected of stealing guns from 3 homes - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Gautier man suspected of stealing guns from 3 homes
text:
GAUTIER, Miss. (AP) - Officials say a 32-year-old Gautier man is accused of stealing firearms and other items from three houses.
Matt Hoggatt with the Gautier Police Department tells The Sun Herald ( http://bit.ly/1MexNik0 ) Derek Savage was arrested last week during a traffic stop in Pascagoula and found with the stolen items.
Hoggatt says Savage was taken to the Gautier Police Department on three counts residential burglary and is being held on a $30,000 bond set by Judge Jason Thornton.
Information from: The Sun Herald, http://www.sunherald.com
